Class Button

  • java.lang.Object
    • java.awt.Component
      • java.awt.Container
        • javax.swing.JComponent
          • javax.swing.AbstractButton
            • javax.swing.JButton
              • Button
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    java.awt.image.ImageObserver, java.awt.ItemSelectable, java.awt.MenuContainer, java.io.Serializable, javax.accessibility.Accessible, javax.swing.SwingConstants

    public class Button
extends javax.swing.JButton
    This class extends JButton class and have methods for working with gamefield buttons.
    See Also:
    Serialized Form

    • Constructor Detail

      • Button

        public Button()
        This is the constructor of this class wich set some params such as font, background color and the text for each button.

      • Button

        public Button(java.lang.String name)
        The another constructor of the class which set the text of the new button when it was initialized with params. name parameter - is the String object.
        Parameters:
        name - String objects with the text wich we want to set.

    • Method Detail

      • setButtonFont

        public void setButtonFont(int i)
        This method set the font of the button.
        Parameters:
        i - int identificator for choose the font of the button. 1 - classic font. 2 - styled font. 3 - "Mistral" font.

      • setButtonBackground

        public void setButtonBackground(int i)
        This method set the background color of the button.
        Parameters:
        i - is the int identificator for choose the color. 1 - green color. 2 - yellow color. 3 - blue color.

      • setButtonAsX

        public void setButtonAsX()
        This method marks the button as "X".

      • setButtonAsO

        public void setButtonAsO()
        This method marks the button as "O".

      • setButtonAs

        public void setButtonAs(java.lang.String str)
        This method set text of the button.
        Parameters:
        str - String object with the text we want to set as button text.

      • gamePlay

        public void gamePlay(Panel panel)
        This method contains the algorithm which provides the main gameplay for two players.
        Parameters:
        panel - is the object of JPanel class.
